property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ During your opponent's turn, this creature gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may summon a creature that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-14 Fabulous Art: The Faerie Timeline

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone that cost 7 or more, this spell costs 2 less to cast. ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Draw 2 cards: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into it's owner's mana zone: ► Shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card. If it's a creature, put it.

property.name: Race2

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature in any way except by summoning during their turn, you may have that creature battle this creature. TWINPACT ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, put all Giants and Snow Faeries into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.value: Please support us together!

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie

property.name: Race1
property.value: Snow Faerie

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, untap up to 2 cards in your mana zone. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Discard a card from your hand. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures that has 6000 power or less and destroy it. If the discarded card was a Snow Faerie, choose another one of your opponent's creatures that has 6000 power or less and destroy it.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, untap up to 2 cards in your mana zone.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Discard a card from your hand. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures that has 6000 power or less and destroy it. If the discarded card was a Snow Faerie, choose another one of your opponent's creatures that has 6000 power or less and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then if you have 5 or less cards in your mana zone, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
